title: Arizona Certifies Narrow Victory for Biden
sub_head: Wisconsin also expected to finalize results, cementing president-elect’s wins in battleground states that decided the race
body:
Arizona certified election results Monday showing President-elect Joe Bidenwon there by a narrow margin, further diminishing President Trump’s path to reversing the outcome as the last battleground states finalize their vote counts.
Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat, signed the official canvas documents alongside two Republican state officials, Gov. Doug Ducey and Attorney General Mark Brnovich, and the chief judge of Arizona’s supreme court, Robert Brutinel, a Republican appointee.
